entry.data:
PATCHY FOG THIS MORNING
SUNNY, HOT WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 90S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS LIKELY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 60
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
